mutants.code:
def create_user_id(first_name, last_name, dob):
    user_info = f'{first_name.lower()}{last_name.lower()}_{dob}'
    hashed_info = hash(user_info)
    user_id = hex(hashed_info)[2:12]
    return user_id

    return user_id
